Trade/Device Name(s): BD FACSTM Sample Prep Assistant III
Regulation Name(s): Pipetting and Diluting System for Clinical Use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD FACSTM Sample Prep Assistant III, an automated pipetting and diluting accessory for preparing whole blood samples for flow cytometric analysis on BD flow cytometry systems.
Indications for Use Summary: Automates pipetting of blood, reagents, and lysing solution to prepare whole blood for flow cytometric analysis with specified assays on BD FACSCanto II and BD FACSCalibur systems.
